entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
